ts_semantic_feature_detector.input_utils.extractor package

Submodules

ts_semantic_feature_detector.input_utils.extractor.extractor module

Module that implements rosbag and svo extracting functionalities.

class ts_semantic_feature_detector.input_utils.extractor.extractor.DataExtractor(data_path: str, rosbag_file: str, svo_file: str)[source]

Bases: object

Implements a customized rosbags and SVO data extractor.

This extractor is not intended for general use. It has pre-defined topics needed by this project.

Initializes the data extractor.

Parameters:

  • data_path (str) –

    the path to the the upper folder where the compressed and the extracted data are storaged. It is expected a folder arrangement similar to:

    /data
    /rosbag

    • .bag file

    /svo

    • .svo file

  • rosbag_file (str) – the .bag file name.

  • svo_file (str) – the .svo file name.

_create_folder_if_needed(path: str) → None[source]

Creates a folder if it does not exist yet.

Parameters:

path (str) – the path to the desired folder.

FIXME: permission problem when creating folders.

_get_svo_subscribers(topics: Dict, data_path: str) → List[source]

Defines the ROS subscribers to get SVO data.

It is intended to be changed manually if needed.

Parameters:

  • topics (dict [str, str]) – all the desired topics published by the SVO file.

  • data_path (str) – the path to the the upper folder where the compressed and the extracted data are storaged.

Returns:

subscribers (list) – the ROS subscribers.

_get_topics_names() → Tuple[Dict, Dict][source]

Defines the topics names.

It is intended to be changed manually if needed. This class code needs to be changed to add/remove ROS subscribers and callbacks.

Returns:

  • rosbag_topics (dict [str, np.ndarray]) – the topics to be extracted from the rosbag.

  • svo_topics (dict [str, np.ndarray]) – the topics to be extracted from the SVO file.

_svo_img_cb(msg: Image, path: str)[source]

Callback for SVO image messages.

It saves the images as PNG files with corresponding time stamps.

Parameters:

  • msg (sensor_msgs.msg.Image) – the ROS Image message.

  • path (str) – the path to the folder where the images will be saved.

_write_rosbag_raw_data(bag: Bag, topics: Dict, data_path: str) → None[source]

Writes all desired data to the data folder.

Parameters:

  • bag (rosbag.Bag) – an object containing the rosbag data.

  • topics (dict [str, str]) – all the desired topics published by the rosbag.

  • data_path (str) – the path to the the upper folder where the compressed and the extracted data are storaged.

_write_svo_raw_data(svo_file: str, data_path: str) → ROSLaunchParent[source]

Writes all desired data to the data folder.

Parameters:

  • svo_file (str) – the name of the SVO file.

  • data_path (str) – the path to the the upper folder where the compressed and the extracted data are storaged.

Returns:

  • the roslaunch.parent.ROSLaunchParent object. It can be

  • used to stop the nodes from the executable.
